groupTrips.label: Group Trips
groupTrips.description: People who want to pool money for a group trip to specific destinations.

sustainability.label: Sustainability Projects
sustainability.description: Users interested in funding ecological projects, such as community gardens or recycling initiatives.

weddings.label: Weddings and Events
weddings.description: Groups that come together to save and plan weddings, birthday parties, or other social events.

education.label: Education and Group Courses
education.description: People who gather to fund online or in-person courses, workshops, and professional training.

sports.label: Sports and Adventure
sports.description: Users interested in pooling money to participate in group sports activities, such as hiking, races, or championships.

socialCauses.label: Support for Social Causes
socialCauses.description: People who organize to raise funds for social causes, such as supporting NGOs, inclusion projects, or humanitarian aid.

hobbies.label: Collecting and Hobbies
hobbies.description: Groups that gather to fund purchases or events related to hobbies such as collecting, photography, music, etc.

technology.label: Technology and Gadgets
technology.description: Interests focused on raising funds to buy new tech devices as a group.

wellbeing.label: Wellness Initiatives
wellbeing.description: Groups that come together to fund wellness-related activities, such as meditation retreats, yoga, or spa.

localCommunities.label: Local Communities
localCommunities.description: People who want to pool money to improve their community, whether building parks, organizing events, or local infrastructure projects.

services.label: Service Provision
services.description: Users who want to offer or hire services from micro-entrepreneurs, such as plumbers, electricians, painters, etc.

consulting.label: Consulting and Mentorship
consulting.description: Interests aimed at connecting consultants and mentors with small entrepreneurs seeking guidance in areas such as marketing, finance, and management.

crafts.label: Handmade Products Sales
crafts.description: Micro-entrepreneurs who want to sell handmade products, such as clothing, accessories, or decor items.

delivery.label: Local Delivery and Logistics
delivery.description: Local delivery services for micro-entrepreneurs who need to distribute their products.

digitalMarketing.label: Digital Marketing for Small Businesses
digitalMarketing.description: Micro-entrepreneurs interested in hiring digital marketing services, such as social media management, website creation, and online ads.

foodServices.label: Food Services
foodServices.description: Connecting micro-entrepreneurs who offer food services, such as catering, food trucks, or homemade meals, with consumers or companies.

softwareDevelopment.label: Technology and Software Development
softwareDevelopment.description: Developers and IT professionals offering services to create websites, apps, or tech solutions for small businesses.

education.label: Corporate Education and Training
education.description: Courses and training aimed at equipping micro-entrepreneurs in areas like business management, sales, and customer service.

design.label: Design and Branding
design.description: Graphic design services, logo creation, packaging, and branding for small businesses.

coworking.label: Coworking and Shared Workspaces
coworking.description: Interest in sharing or renting coworking spaces, ideal for micro-entrepreneurs who need a flexible workspace.

friendsPage.instructions: Manage your connections, find new friends, and keep your relationships active.
friendsPage.name: Name
friendsPage.noFriendsFound: No friends found. How about inviting some?
friendsPage.noResults: No results found. Try a different search.

invitationSendModal.problem: We encountered a problem creating the invite, please try again in a few minutes.
invitationSendModal.termsError: Please agree to the terms and allow profile sharing.
invitationSendModal.title: Send Invitation
invitationSendModal.rules: By sending an invitation, you agree to the following rules:
invitationSendModal.rule1: The invite can only be resent 1 hour after the first send.
invitationSendModal.rule2: The invitee will have 5 days from the date of receiving the invite to validate it. Otherwise, the invite will expire.
invitationSendModal.rule3: No information about the already registered user will be revealed until they confirm they want to connect.
invitationSendModal.agreeTerms: By sending an invite, you agree to Elos' terms of use and privacy policy.
invitationSendModal.shareProfile: The friend receiving the invite will have access to your name and profile picture.
